column1: [Wojnarowski] Undrafted Clemson F Aamir Simms has agreed to a a deal with the Knicks, source tells ESPN.
With Aamir Simms agreeing to a deal with the Knicks, The NBA has 3 current players named Simmons, Simons and Simms
With the Knicks drafting Aamir Simms, The NBA has 3 current players named Simmons, Simons and Simms
[Begley] Dwayne Bacon and Aamir Simms signed deals with the Knicks yesterday, per the NBA transaction page.
[Knicks PR] The New York Knicks have waived Brandon Knight, Aamir Simms, and M.J. Walker
